reqs:
The title of this course is Strategy and Innovation.
This section is restricted to students in the Master of Engineering Leadership (MEL) and Master of Health Leadership and Policy (MHLP) programs.
courseName: Topics in Business Administration - TPC BUSINS ADMIN
description: Restricted to students in one of: E.M.B.A., M.B.A., J.D./M.B.A., M.M., or M.B.A./M.A.A.
